transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir good morning.
Customer: Good morning bhaiya.
Executive: Sir main Roshan baat kar raha hun Nikki ka manager IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya. Hello.
Executive: Ji sir bataye sir. Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Wo thoda mera accident ho gaya sir hath mein fracture hai paon mein chot hai.
Executive: Oh ho kaise sir theek toh hai jyada dikkat toh nahi hai?
Customer: Na pareshan nahi hai le koi cheez pakad bhi nahi pa raha na likh pa raha kuch plaster chada hua hai na.
Executive: Ji sir thoda dhyan rakhiye aapne sir customer care number pe call kiya hua tha.
Customer: Haan sir maine customer care pe call kiya tha lekin mujhe Nikki mam se kuch kaam karane the.
Executive: Ji bataye.
Customer: Wo main review ke bare mein keh raha tha wo. Kyunki ek problem aa rahi hai do teen logon ne mujhe ligi utare hain.
Customer: Hmm. Har ek do ek logon ne fake review dale hain jo jinhe main janta nahi hun koi delivery nahi unki inquiry aayi aur unhone mujhe one star ya two star de diya. Usse meri rating kam aa gayi.
Customer: Kyun online business mein. Inquiry aayi thi kya aapke paas mein?
Customer: Haan inquiry aayi thi lekin koi baat chit nahi hoti inquiry aane ke baad maine matlab inquiry nahi lead aayi thi.
Customer: Lead maine consume karne ke baad maine number save karke maine aapki presentation unhe bhej di.
Executive: Sir kiski baat kar rahe hain aap Sagar ji ki baat kar rahe hain kya?
Customer: Sagar ji ka sath mein scene ye hai ek jab baat ho hi rahi hai.
Customer: Dekhiye do logon se toh maine sahi kara li.
Customer: Haan. Ek minute.
Customer: Are printer band kariyo. Ek minute bhaiya main call raha hun.
Customer: Ek minute sir. Hmm.
Customer: Wo sir jab calling ho rahi hoti hai wo.
Customer: Are. Achha review mein jao.
Customer: Haan review mein tha.
Customer: Dekhiye Rahul Singh ne direct hi Rahul Singh se maine sahi kara li. Rahul Shah ne dala tha wo maine sahi kara diya. Dishank ye toh genuine hai Aman genuine hai ye Sagar sahab hain. Sagar sahab ne mujhe 40 lakh ka order diya. Ye Pune ki party hai.
Customer: Hmm. Aur inhone 40 lakh ka order diya mujhe 10 lakh advance de bole kaam shuru karaiye aap main aur advance dunga. Maine inke performance jo time period tha sab kam Diwali se mere paas puri file bani hui hai inki. Diwali se inhe ek hafte mein material chahiye tha.
Customer: Hmm. Toh matlab ek bottle do matlab ye samajhiye aap 3000 bottle aur 6000 glass inhe ek hafte mein chahiye the.
Customer: Hmm. Maine raat aur din kaam karaye inhone 10 lakh rupay dale maine 12 lakh 70 hazaar rupay ka maine material bhej diya. Sagar sahab khud yahan aaye char paanch din yahan rahe maine hotel arrange karaya inhe sath mein rehna ghumna phirna khana peena sab sath mein rakha. Inhone pehle review toh bahut achcha diya mujhe bahut achcha.
Customer: Hmm. Haan. Pehle review bahut achcha diya. Hmm. Aur jab 12 lakh 70 hazaar ka maine maal bhej diya. Hmm. Toh Sagar sahab se maine kaha maine Sagar sahab payment karaiye main material aur bhejunga. Hmm. Bole aap mujhe kam se kam aadha material bhejo teen lakh rupay ka uske baad main payment karaunga. Bhai unknown person ko main lakh do lakh ka udhar de sakta hun 10 10 12 lakh ka udhar nahi de sakta sir. Obvious obvious si baat hai.
Customer: Toh Sagar sahab ne pehle toh bahut achcha review dala bahut achcha wo purana review inka ek minute ek minute kholta hun. Ek second sir. Namaskar sir.
Customer: Toh pehle unhone bahut achcha review dala. Ab jab maine mana kar diya unse maine sir aap payment material mere paas rakha hai stock hai. Hmm. Lekin main dunga agar jab aap mujhe payment karaiye. Right. Ab unhone payment karai nahi 2 lakh 70 hazaar rupay mere dues hain unke upar. Hmm. Ab unhone ye bahut galat comments ke sath mein mujhe review dala. Achcha. Haan.
Executive: Sir isme toh dekhiye sir hum kya hi kar payenge itna aapki baat chit hui hai aur us accordingly unhone jo bhi ye kara hua hai unhone apne according review kara hua hai. Toh ye toh chalo ye customer badmash hote hain ya koi supplier bahut sari cheezon mein hote hain toh isme toh hamara specific aisa hum kuch kar nahi sakte to be honest. Hum usme aapki help kar sakte hain. Sagar sahab ne pehle review dala tha Sagar sahab ka maamla nahi chal raha. Hmm.
Executive: Sagar sahab ne jo pehle review dala bahut achcha dala tha. Main aapko bhejunga whatsapp pe screen share kar. Koi nahi aap mujhe whatsapp pe bhej dijiyega. Theek hai? Sahi hai. Achcha dusra ek ek cheez MK industries ek minute sir. Ye toh 2 November ka hai na. MK metal karke. MK metal ka. In sahab ko main janta hi nahi. Koi delivery nahi. Ye bahut purana review hai. Haan toh maine usi time maine Nikki mam se keh diya tha. Achcha. Bole ye ye hum khatam kara denge. Sir main dekhta hun aisa koi guarantee nahi hai agar aapka connection wagera nahi hua hoga toh we can try for that lekin agar connection hua hoga toh sir hum review mein changes kuch nahi karwa sakte usme kuch customer hamare paas nahi hai. Nahi mera inse koi business nahi hai. Nahi koi business nahi hua inse koi query nahi hui koi detail nahi hui. Toh ye hai main main wahi keh raha hun ki main try kar leta hun lekin isme aisa koi guarantee nahi hai. That we can do anything in that. Achcha ek cheez aur yaad aayi sir dusri cheez ye thi ab jaise do teen log mujhe review dalna chah rahe hain diye un logon ne. Haan. Ab unke review mere kya bolte hain use lead manager pe toh aa raha show ho raha hai. Mere portal pe show nahi ho raha hai. Aap mujhe uska screenshot bhej de ek baar ko main dikha leta hun naam kya hai unka? Ek Haldwani ke mere client hain Aditya Bisht. Achcha. Koi nahi aap mujhe uska haan koi nahi uska aap mujhe screenshot bhej dijiye wo wala main check kara leta hun. Haan. Aur ek hain Muradabad ke hain unhe maine bhej di hain Mohammad Zeeshan. Achcha. Haan ek ke metal. Achcha. Koi nahi main sabse IndiaMART ke haan IndiaMART ke through aapka connection hua hai usme baat chit hui hai deal hui hai toh aap mujhe uska screenshot bhej dijiye. Right. Na mera sir mera business hua hai unse. Haan haan toh koi koi problem nahi hai sir business hua hai toh hum review agar de rahe hain toh wo de sakta hai. Aisi koi dikkat nahi hai. Aap mere ko Roshan ji main aapko main bhejta hun aapko. Achcha ek cheez ye. Haan. Ek mujhe IndiaMART se ek Ahuja metal industries hain Jagadhri ke. Ahuja metal industries. Wo IndiaMART pe hain then check karna. Achcha. Haan haan Jagadhri se hai. Haan? Haan hai hai hai. Ahuja metal industries hai? Ji hai. Unke unki ek complaint karani thi mujhe. Kya hua sir? Hua ye tha mere paas ek order tha main nikalta hun kabhi performance sab cheezein. Ek minute sir main nikalta hun. Main sir wahan pe plaster banwa raha toh mobile bhi bahut pareshani se chal raha mera. Achcha. Unhe maine 14 September ko ek order likhwaya tha. Hmm. 1150 per kg 10 inch ki sheet uthkar ko brass circuit. Hmm. Brass circuit ka ek order likhwaya tha. Hmm. 722 rupay hamare rate tay hue the urgent sir maine usko order pe likha tha most urgent. Hmm. Hmm. Sab kuch mere paas whatsapp chatting hai. 14 September ko maine 50 hazaar rupay advance bhi dale. Achcha. Unki wajah se mera lagbhag 8 lakh ka order cancel hua unhone mujhe material nahi bheja. Aur na nahi mera advance wapas bhej rahe. Aap ek kaam karunga aap koi dusra number jo IndiaMART pe register nahi hai na. Haan. Uspe aap 9696969696 5 time 96 pe customer care ke number pe aap call kijiyega. Sir main likh leta hun kya number bataye number likhiye aap wahi customer care wala number sir 9696969696. Haan aada number sir. Haan. Haan. Uspe call karke ye complaint aap register karwa dijiyega. Achcha. Ji ho jayega sir. Ho jayega? Haan haan bilkul. Toh ye 96 pe complaint kar karwaun main. Haan haan bilkul sir. Haan dhai mahine ho gaye na mera advance wapas kar raha wo ek lakh rupay mein pahucha hua. Fir toh fir toh complaint kar do sir jaruri hai. Sahi hai na? Haan haan bilkul sir. Toh complaint aap ispe aap toh portal pe karein ya ispe bhi dalein? Haan aap unpe daliye wo daliye. Complaint daliye IndiaMART ke review pe kaise dal sakte hain hum? Wo review mein aapki jahan pe baat chit hui thi na. Haan. Unse IndiaMART pe hi baat hui thi aapki? Na wo IndiaMART ke through nahi hui thi. Aapne direct call kiya tha unhe? Haan sach sach maine IndiaMART se kari thi. Achcha. Toh unke PNS number pe hi call kiya hoga aapne? Haan. Hai na? Haan. Aapke paas toh review ka option aayega aap jab online aaoge na mere ko ek baar yaad call kar lena. Haan. Theek hai? Mean while sir aap uske liye complaint dal sakte ho aap complaint dal dijiye. Achcha. Haan bilkul. Sahi hai sahi hai. Baki main 3 baje connect karta hun. 3 baje connect baki ek baar aur connect sakte hain wo review wala aap jo keh rahe hain ki nahi dikh raha hai na. Hmm. Wo aap mujhe screenshot dal dijiye. Main ek baar ko mean while check kara leta hun hatne wala toh sir usme kuch kar nahi sakte hum log. Lekin ye jo nahi aaye hain usme hum kuch kar sakte hain toh ek baar ko hum wo kar lenge. Sahi hai main jab connect karta hun sir aapko. Haan haan bilkul baki iske alawa.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove fake reviews on IndiaMART.

- Reviews not visible on the portal.

- Complaint against Ahuja Metal Industries.



Resolution:

- Asked to send screenshots of reviews.

- Asked to register a complaint on customer care.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, reviews, complaint, lead manager, pns number
